scripts.gulp: cd _gulp_setup && npm i &&  npm run build1 && npm run build2
scripts.parcel: cd _parcel_setup && npm i && npm run build
scripts.rollup: cd _rollup_setup && npm i && npm run build1 && npm run build2
scripts.webpack: cd _webpack_setup && npm i && npm run build
scripts.other: cd __other_setup && npm i && npm run build
